corner</h3>

is what you<br>
get</h3>
<p class="whyjoin-line"><img src="/portals/27/skins/mweb-2016/img/wj-line.png"></p>

</div>
<!-- /col-sm-3 -->
<div class="col-sm-2 whyjoin-contain"> <img src="/portals/27/skins/mweb-2016/img/block5-gamers.jpg" alt="icon">

on your<br>
team</h3>
